metadata.title: CVE-2021-41803 on Ubuntu 22.10 (kinetic) - medium.
metadata.description: HashiCorp Consul 1.8.1 up to 1.11.8, 1.12.4, and 1.13.1 do not properly validate the node or segment names prior to interpolation and usage in JWT claim assertions with the auto config RPC. Fixed in 1.11.9, 1.12.5, and 1.13.2."

criterions.comment: consul package in kinetic is affected and may need fixing.
